name: City Jam
description:
Turn based city builder.

This game was created for Godot Community Game Jam 2016/2017

The game is not finished. It mostly need balancing, some gameplay tweaks and more content. It is far from being an amazing game but I'm happy to have done it. It was a really good experience for me, and I strongly encourage beginner game developers to participate to such events.

Note: MacOS and Linux version have not been tested.

Source code
